Tom joined the Savings.com team in March of 2007 to manage the companyâ€™s Deal Entry Resources.

Tom Kuljis started his business career in the Direct Marketing industry while studying philosophy in Santa Barbara CA. He signed on at a small ecommerce start-up, in early 2003, and quickly rose through the ranks, occupying various positions including Director of Customer Service, Director of Quality Assurance, and he eventually became the VP of Consumer Relations for the business at the age of 23. Post acquisition he worked as an independent consultant focused primarily on streamlining call center operations and establishing employee training processes for small businesses.
